name: Pyrrhan 1.0
description:
Welcome, intergalactic traveler to a totally new world! Decide how you'd like to get involved with it, and enjoy the comforts of having a life well-chosen on a planet not our own. Just beware that some things may be different, and yet, others, quite familiar...

--

This was a school project that I had a lot of fun creating! Pyrrhan 2.0 might be published in the future, once I have more time! 

NOTE: this game is not compatible with mobile devices! Sorry about that!
